    Quick Start:

    Recommended Unity version is 2023.3 due to a bug in UIToolkit. Minimum supported version is 2022, though it lacks advanced inspector tools.

    Asset Store Version

    1. After obtaining Subtitler through the Asset Store, it will become available in your Unity Package Manager.
    1. To see samples, open Package Manager, navigate to Subtitler. Press Samples and select import. Sample will automatically import into Assets/Samples/Subtitler

    UPM (Obsolete):

    • 2022.2 and above

    1. Import Subtitler https://github.com/GasimoCodes/Subtitler.git?path=com.gasimo.subtitler into Package Manager

    2. To see samples, open Package Manager, navigate to Subtitler. Press Samples and select import. Sample will automatically import into Assets/Samples/Subtitler
